text: iTerm2 is a GPL-licensed terminal emulator for macOS. It was derived from and has mostly supplanted the earlier "iTerm" application. iTerm2 supports operating system features such as window transparency, full-screen mode, split panes, Exposé Tabs, Growl notifications, and standard keyboard shortcuts. Other features include customizable profiles and Instant Replay of past terminal input/output. == See also == * Comparison of terminal emulators * Terminal (macOS), stock terminal emulator for macOS == References == == External links == * * Category:Free software programmed in Objective-C Category:Free terminal emulators Category:MacOS-only free software Category:Utilities for macOS
title: ITerm2
